intro_only_event_buddiesjoin_pm0054_00_k:
Oh! Hi, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Off to do some training?
Me and Psyduck just got back from a quick swim!

No wonder they call you the Tomboyish Mermaid.
You’re always in the water!

I think you were wearing that same swimsuit
when we battled at your Gym in Kanto, right?
That was an unexpected surprise!

Come to think of it, I don’t remember you battling
with this Psyduck back then...

True! I don’t think he was quite ready for Gym
battling when you came to visit.

But since coming to Pasio, I’ve trained him up to
be just as strong as Starmie and the others!

Ooh, I’ll have to keep an eye on him, then!
I’m excited to see what you two can do!

Now that we’re a sync pair, you can see
it firsthand!
